song.title: Univute Karibu
song.englishTitle: Closer to Thee, My Father, Draw Me

verses.verse: Univute karibu, Baba, Unikumbatie; Unisogeze kifuani, Nataka pumziko.
Univute Mwokozi wangu, Na tusiachane; Mikono yako juu yangu Leo niione.
Univute kwa Roho yako, Nifanane nawe; Unioshe, unihuishe, Niwe safi, huru.
